attributes.action: Resign and instate Boris Johnson as President of England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need a man in charge with some integrity, ingenuity, intelligence, common sense and gosh-darn-it, damn good hair.  We need Boris!  Stand down Mr Prime minister, no-one voted for you and no one wants you.  We want Boris.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
